data.actual_result: There may be invisible characters. Clicking on them prevents scrolling. Clicking may open a user's profile card.
data.short_description: When having compact appearance, there may be invisible characters under or overlapping with *some* messages
data.steps_to_repro: - Have compact appearance - Hover your cursor under messages - Repeat until it appears (precise positions of the invisible characters depend at least on chat position and console width)
